CustomField.description: Enables the reminder slack message sent to the Opportunity owner when their Account is already a Reference Program Member, and they have not responded to the initial Reference Lead Finder notification.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enables the reminder slack message sent to the Opportunity owner when their Account is already a Reference Program Member, and they have not responded to the initial Reference Lead Finder notification.
CustomField.label: RLF Reminder - New Contact Slack
